title: A Vow of Silence
description: "Outstanding." Publishers WeeklyA Sister Joan Mystery.The sisters at lonely Cornwall Convent share chilling secrets they cannot confess . . . Sister Sophia is dead. Sister Magdalen has vanished. Sister Joan, newly transferred to the convent to investigate its mysterious troubles, begins to suspect what she hardly dares to Blasphemy . . . and worse . . .
author: Veronica Black
